text: (hamane pharamaaya) ai daood hamane tumako zameen mein (apana) naeb qaraar diya to tum logon ke daramiyaan bilkul theek phaisala kiya karo aur nafasiyaanee khvaahish kee pairavee na karo basa ye peeron tumhen khuda kee raah se bahaka degee isamen shak nahin ki jo log khuda kee raah mein bhatakate hain unakee badee sakht saza hogee kyonki un logon ne hisaab ke din (qayaamat) ko bhula diya
